entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 92
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 31 Photos of the special event 2005-0813 Musical Evening, NJ, U.S.A. have been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 31 medium resolutions from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the 31 Photos in the smallest gallery: Collection 2005.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 27: Updates
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Crowns' galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, they form the first 28 galleries of the folder Permanent Displays.
Please keep in mind that, as the CCT database is monthly organized, in due time some of these galleries will be divided into 2 or more galleries.
Please kindly share the folder's link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
